verbs.description: [ARG0: sixers joel embiid] [V: makes] [ARG1: a statement against andre drummond and the pistons in a 109 - 99 win joel embiid] led the sixers to another home victory scoring 39 points and grabbing 17 rebounds embiid had 32 points at the half as philadelphia defeated detroit 109 - 99 milwaukee bucks andre drummond allen iverson twitter jj redick joel embiid landry shamet sixers axgilbert j j redick philadelphia brett brown anthony gilbert pistons mike muscala wilson chandler
